sentence.Network_en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentence.Network_en: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
sentence.Network_cn: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

sentence.Network_en: I don't think a sedentary life would altogether suit me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为长期伏案的生活一点也不适合我。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 凡字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 凡是,一切〖 all〗 总共〖 altogether〗 平常;普通〖 ordinary〗.
牛津3000词汇表_百度文库 ... although conj. 虽然 altogether ad. 完全； 总而言之 always adv. 总是,一直.
大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... although conj. 虽然, 尽管 altogether adv. 完全地, 总而言之 always adv. 总是,永远.
咱们大要一共(Altogether)走了有快要四个小时，知道有些话只是听听就算了。比如“下次我请你”，“有机会大家一起发财”等等。

list.abs: 进出口专业英语词汇(A3)|商贸常用英语词汇 ... altobasseo 高低绒头丝绒 altogether coal 原煤 altometer 经纬仪.

lj.lj_ly: she's agreed to pose in the altogether.

entry.def: You use altogether to emphasize that something has stopped, been done, or finished completely.

example.ex: When Artie stopped calling altogether, Julie found a new man...
example.tran: 当阿蒂彻底不再上门后，朱莉又找了个男人。

example.ex: His tour may have to be cancelled altogether...
example.tran: 他的旅行可能不得不彻底取消。

entry.tran: （用于形容词或副词前表示强调）显然，完全
entry.def: You use altogether in front of an adjective or adverb to emphasize a quality that someone or something has.

example.ex: The choice of language is altogether different...
example.tran: 对语言的选择完全是另一回事。

example.ex: Today's celebrations have been altogether more sedate...
example.tran: 今天的庆祝活动显然更加庄重。

entry.def: You use altogether to modify a negative statement and make it less forceful.

example.ex: We were not altogether sure that the comet would miss the Earth...
example.tran: 我们不能完全肯定彗星不会与地球相撞。

example.ex: The fashion business, he claims, not altogether convincingly, is more real than the film business...
example.tran: 他声称时尚业比电影业更真实，但他的话并不完全令人信服。

entry.def: You can use altogether to introduce a summary of what you have been saying.

example.ex: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
example.tran: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

entry.def: If several amounts add up to a particular amount altogether, that amount is their total.

example.ex: Britain has a dozen warships in the area, with a total of five thousand military personnel altogether...
example.tran: 英国在该地区驻有12艘战舰，共有5,000名军人。

example.ex: Altogether seven inmates escaped by scaling a wall and climbing down scaffolding.
example.tran: 总共有7名犯人攀墙从脚手架上爬下来逃走了。

means.word_mean: 1. to a complete degree or to the full or entire extent (`whole' is often used informally for `wholly');

sentences.sentence: "it was completely different from what we expected"
"altogether he earns close to a million dollars"
"all in all, it's not so bad"

auth_sentence.content: Closer inspection reveals it to be something altogether different.
auth_sentence.res_content: Closer inspection reveals it to be something altogether different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Closer inspection reveals it to be something altogether different.

auth_sentence.content: It is an altogether deceptive occupation in my view.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is an altogether deceptive occupation in my view.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is an altogether deceptive occupation in my view.

auth_sentence.content: He would have liked to give up computers altogether.
auth_sentence.res_content: He would have liked to give up computers altogether.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He would have liked to give up computers altogether.

stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+most最多→adv.几乎, 差不多
al全部+ready准备→全部准备好了
al全部+so如此→全部如此→也,同样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+together共同, 一起→adv.完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
al加强+though虽然→conj.虽然, 尽管

Sentence.sentence: And what if Americans become so familiar with having Obama as their president that they stop considering his race altogether?
The worst possible aspect of the Obama effect is that people could ignore his race altogether and continue to hold on to their old racial stereotypes

sentences.en: I don't altogether agree with you.
sentences.cn: 我并不完全同意你的看法。

sentences.en: I'd like to have 100 sheets altogether.
Altogether, our achievements are very great.
sentences.cn: 总而言之, 我们的成绩是很大的。

jushi.chinese: 你的工作做得完美无缺。

jushi.english: The author wrote seven books altogether.
It is altogether an impossible task to perform.
jushi.chinese: 这根本是不可能完成的任务。
